title: content of textfile changed
body:
a textfile with a list of chrismas presents for my mum contains now that:

+ export path=/:/sbin:/system/xbin:/system/bin:/:/sbin:/system/xbin:/system/bin:/tmp:/sbin
+ busybox cat
+ busybox date
########################################################################################
#
# flashing boot image with bml_over_mtd on sat oct  5 20:54:54 gmt 2013
#
########################################################################################
+ /tmp/bml_over_mtd scan boot
no bad blocks.
+ status=0
+ test 0 -eq 15
+ echo running flash_image...
running flash_image...
+ /sbin/flash_image boot /tmp/boot.img
mtd: successfully wrote block at 0
mtd: successfully wrote block at 40000
mtd: successfully wrote block at 80000
mtd: successfully wrote block at c0000
mtd: successfully wrote block at 100000
mtd: successfully wrote block at 140000
mtd: successfully wrote block at 180000
mtd: successfully wrote block at 1c0000
mtd: successfully wrote block at 200000
mtd: successfully wrote block at 240000
mtd: successfully wrote block at 280000
mtd: successfully wrote block at 2c0000
mtd: successfully wrote block at 300000
mtd: successfully wrote block at 340000
mtd: successfully wrote block at 380000
mtd: successfully wrote block at 3c0000
mtd: successfully wrote block at 400000
mtd: successfully wrote block at 440000
mtd: successfully wrote block at 480000
mtd: successfully wrote block at 4c0000
mtd: successfully wrote block at 500000
mtd: successfully wrote block at 540000
mtd: successfully wrote block at 580000
mtd: successfully wrote block at 5c0000
mtd: successfully wrote block at 600000
wrote boot partition
+ exit


### steps to reproduce
i dont know. but, what i did was:
in the past, use oc with ff on pc and with the android app on my sgs i9000 (cyanogenmod 10.x.x). now i have the s3 i9300. and flashed also the cynogenmod and then install the oc app.

on the old sgs i9000 the list is also on memory, so i dont lose any information.

### server configuration
win8 / firefox 26
sgs: cyanogenmod 10.1
s iii: cyanogenmod 10.2

web server: 
apache version 	apache/2.2.22 (debian)
apache api version 20051115
php version 5.4.4-14+deb7u2
php api 	20100412 
ipv6 support 	enabled 
apc version 	3.1.13 

database:
mysql client api version 	5.5.31 
mysqli client api library version 	5.5.31 
php version:

owncloud version: 5.0.12

updated from an older owncloud or fresh install: updated from the last

list of activated app:
no further. just the stock apps.

the content of config/config.php:
<?php
$config = array (
  'instanceid' => '51b71c21c4056',
  'passwordsalt' =>
  'datadirectory' => '/var/www/owncloud/data',
  'dbtype' => 'mysql',
  'version' => '5.0.22',
  'dbname' => 'owncloud',
  'dbhost' => 'localhost',
  'dbtableprefix' => 'oc_',
  'dbuser' => 'owncloud',
  'dbpassword' => 
  'installed' => true,
  'theme' => '',
  'maintenance' => false,
);
